review: I thought I would be thrilled with this, however do your research as to what it actually can do, and what it can not do.I am disappointed. Even though the price is relatively low, I would rather pay more to get more. Sony, WD, Roku, all have similar devices , but not exactly. Please, before buying , do check out what this unit is capable of and specifically what it is not intended to do.
